name: tirto_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool indonesia_news.
Tool description: We are focused on delivering data from major news websites in Indonesia.
API description: Searches Tirto news data using the RapidAPI interface.

limit.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

q.description: The query string to search for in Tirto news articles.

page.description: The page number for paginated results.
